forceVisible.description: If `true`, hidden elements will be visible.

defaultExpanded.description: Which tree items are expanded by default.

expanded.description:
Optionally pass a writable store to control the expanded items of the tree.
If provided, this will override the value of the `defaultTree` prop.

onExpandedChange.description: A callback called when the value of the `expanded` store should be changed.

expanded.description: A store holding the expanded items of the tree.

selectedId.description: A store holding the currently selected item in the tree.

isExpanded.description: A helper store that determines if the tree view item with id === `itemId` is expanded.

isSelected.description: A helper store that determines if the tree view item with id === `itemId` is selected.
